verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5563>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G116>Athens<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%>, <S%G1085>born<s%> in <S%G4193>Pontus<s%>, <S%G4373>lately<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2482>Italy<s%>, <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%>; <S%G1223>(because<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> had <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>:) and <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> he <S%G1511>was<s%> of the same <S%G3673>craft<s%>, he <S%G3306>lived<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2038>worked<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> by their <S%G5078>occupation<s%> they were <S%G4635>tentmakers<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864%G99999>synagogue<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613%G99999>when<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> had <S%G2718>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G4912>compelled<s%> by the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, and <S%G1263>testified<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they <S%G498>opposed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%>, he <S%G1621>shook<s%> his <S%G2440>clothes<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> be <S%G1909>upon<s%> your <S%G5216>own<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%>; <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>clean<s%>: <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3568>henceforth<s%> I will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1484>Nations<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%>, and <S%G2064>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3614>man<s%>'s house, <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, one <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G4576>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>whose<s%> <S%G3614%G99999>house<s%> <S%G4927>abutted<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2921>Crispus<s%>, the chief ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%>, <S%G4100>believed<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2881>Corinthians<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3705>vision<s%>, <S%G5399>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4623>hold<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> your <S%G4623>peace<s%>:

<S%G1360>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> shall <S%G2007>attack<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> to <S%G2559>hurt<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>: <S%G1360>for<s%> <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> he <S%G2523>continued<s%> there a <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>, <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> was the <S%G445>deputy<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> made <S%G2721>insurrection<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> against <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%>,
<S%G3754>Saying<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> fellow <S%G374>persuades<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was now <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3303%G99999>If<s%> it <S%G2258>were<s%> a <S%G5100>matter<s%> of <S%G92>wrong<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G4467>lewdness<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> you <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3056>reason<s%> would <S%G2596>that<s%> I should <S%G430%G99999>bear<s%> with <S%G5216>you<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G2213>question<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>, look <S%G3700%G99999>you<s%> to <S%G1063>it<s%>; for <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> of such <S%G5130>matters<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G556>drove<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G4988>Sosthenes<s%>, the chief ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G5180>beat<s%> him <S%G1715>before<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> cared <S%G3199>for<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of those <S%G5130>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> after this <S%G4357>stayed<s%> there <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G2425>good<s%> <S%G2250>while<s%>, and then took his <S%G657>leave<s%> of the <S%G80>brothers<s%>, and sailed from <S%G1602>there<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%>; having <S%G2751>shorn<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchrea<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G2171>vow<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G2548>and<s%> left <S%G2641>them<s%> <S%G847>there<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1525>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2065>desired<s%> him <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G4119%G99999>longer<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, he <S%G1962>consented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>;

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G657>told<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G657>farewell<s%>, <S%G2036>saying<s%>, <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> by all <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4160>keep<s%> this <S%G1859>feast<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> I will <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2309>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>wills<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G321>sailed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2718>landed<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2542>CÃ¦sarea<s%>, and gone <S%G305>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>greeted<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>, he went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> after he had <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1831>there<s%>, he departed, and went <S%G1330>over<s%> all the <S%G5561>country<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%> in <S%G2517>order<s%>, <S%G1991>strengthening<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%>, <S%G1085>born<s%> at <S%G221>Alexandria<s%>, an <S%G3052>eloquent<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G5607>and<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>, <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>.

This <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2727>instructed<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G199>diligently<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to speak <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1161>synagogue<s%>: <S%G846>whom<s%> <S%G191>when<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%>, they <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4355>to<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>, and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> more <S%G199>perfectly<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1014>disposed<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%>, <S%G4389>exhorting<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G588>receive<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G3739>who<s%>, when he was <S%G3854>come<s%>, helped <S%G4820>them<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2159>mightily<s%> <S%G1246>convinced<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, and that <S%G1219>publicly<s%>, <S%G1925>showing<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> <S%G1925>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
